creator: tp@informationsdesign.de
text:
I`m using Tomcat 3.2.2 under Linux Suse. When I run Tomcat in standalone mode 
on port 80 an have a virtual host, URL rewritting does not work properly. This 
is very bad - since I already removed apache to avoid the url rewritting 
problems I had with apache - but they remain even in standalone mode.

Need more info ( configs, logs and so on ).. at least a better explanation of 
what your seeing .. and better a brief test case to be able to reproduce it..
creator: nacho@apache.org
